text: {{Infobox video game | designer = Visual Impact | publisher = Storm City Games | composer = | engine = | released = Retail DSiWare | genre = Shooter | modes = Single-player, online multiplayer | platforms = Nintendo DSi, DSiWare }} System Flaw (System Flaw Recruit on DSiWare) is an action shooter video game that was made and released by American studio Storm City Games. It came out for the Nintendo DSi on October 27, 2009 in North America, as the first game on a cartridge ("Nintendo DSi-exclusive"), and on January 21, 2010 in Europe, and on DSiWare in North America on April 26, 2010 and Europe on April 16, 2010. Players shoot enemies named "flaws", which are at what the camera sees. ==References== Category:2009 video games Category:DSiWare games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo DS-only games Category:Shooter games Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: System Flaw
